title: Leaves from my diary, containing incidents connected with a sea voyage taken May 20, 1899, from New York to Naples.
author: Wilson, Julia Virginia (Phelps)
snippet: A gentleman had said to me at Melrose, I think "Edinburg  is the most beautiful city in the world." While I could not say this, I do say that it is most delightfully located, and that the view from my window at the Royal McGregor hotel, I would like to see reproduced, and think it would compare favorably with any landscape I have ever seen on canvas.
